name: Bounce 'n' Light
description:
Bounce 'n' Light is a 2D arcade/puzzle game that combines the playability of table hockey and mini-golf with minimalist graphics in which the player's goal is to get the circle to bypass the obstacles and reach the goal.

FEATURES

  • 30 Levels
  • Leaderboard
  • 12 Skins
  • 12 Colors
  • Support for 7 languages
  • Neon Effect

V. 1.0.0

  • 6 New Musics;
  • Sound Effect when you hit the goal;
  • Bug fixes;
